mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOUND(bound_id, company_id, bound_date, partner_code, bound_type, isDelete, bound_no, emp_id, bound_state, bound_category) VALUES (#{bound_id}, #{company_id}, #{bound_date}, #{partner_code}, #{bound_type}, #{isDelete}, #{bound_no}, #{emp_id}, #{bound_state}, #{bound_category})
